Text: The patch included in this clearly contains an actual Trojan appended to the actual legitimate patch file (which works, but besides the point if it actually infects you). Extracts a randomized file with an "M" icon in your %AppData% and runs in the background with changed permissions to prevent you from removing it. Most people who use these programs are experienced computer techs; whatever that was draining our CPU has been removed. Whenever I get the chance, I will be reporting this for removal. Don't fuck around with the ThePirateBay..
